name: DocRef
description: Search and retrieve all the references to documents related to a patient.

parameter.name: patient
parameter.documentation: The id of the patient resource.

parameter.name: start
parameter.documentation: The start date-time of the date range relates to care dates, not record currency dates.

parameter.name: end
parameter.documentation: The end date-time of date range relates to care dates, not record currency dates.

parameter.name: type
parameter.documentation: The type relates to document type.

parameter.name: on-demand
parameter.documentation: The value dictating whether they are requesting only 'on-demand' or both 'on-demand' and 'stable' documents.

parameter.name: profile
parameter.documentation: The value for requesting documents according to a specific profile using the profile's canonical reference.
